title: Technology for the 1972 Olympic Games
brief_description: To carry out such a world event as the 1972 Olympic Games in Munich, a wide range of the most modern technical devices were necessary. The film highlights some of the technical achievements of the Games, in which Siemens Industries played an important technical role.
